name: Holo - ( Spice and Wolf )
description:
Trained on anything-v4.5.ckpt,

suggested weight should be 0.5 at least, works good in 0.6~1.

  • Recommended tag: Holo, spice and wolf , spicytail

  • useful tag: wolf girl, wolf ears, wolf tail, red eye, brown hair, grin, fang,

  • Characteristic tag (strongly suggested): (pouch:1)

Note:

  1. if want to approach the original artist painting style, do use the artist name as prompt, for example: ( ayakura Juu ), ( Koume Keito ), ( Kawakami Rokkaku )

  2. a higher weight also could approach the artist painting style.

  3. if naked and wanna keep the pouch, recommended tag as ( pouch above chest )

This lora is trained after discussed with the maker of Holo (Spice and Wolf), reduced many complex background images, trained around three main Spice and wolf artist: Ayakura Juu, Koume Keito, Kawakami Rokkaku, retrained the main Characteristic object: [ pouch ], make it more Holo.
